name: Beach Suites

reviews.text: My family and I stayed in 2 penthouses - 1x3bdm + 1x2bdm - over a weekend in Mar (Note, a perfect place to stay if you are hosting/attending a wedding opposite in the Byron Bay SLSC). The penthouse themselves are outstanding - extremely spacious living areas + huge bedrooms (all with massive ensuites) - the furniture + furnishings are modern/trendy + in excellent condition. The rooftop entertaining areas with large heated pools are awesome + provide uninterrupted views of Main Beach, Julian Rocks + the Lighthouse. You cant get a better location in Byron Bay either - walk across the road to the park + beach or 2 mins to Beach Hotel or main street with a plethora of bars/cafes/shops. Management were very helpful/pleasant in the lead up to + during our stay. Overall, a very classy establishment in which I will definitely be visiting again in the near future!
reviews.title: A perfect penthouse in paradise!

reviews.text: As someone that has been traveling all around New South Wales for the past few weeks, I've stayed at more accommodations than I can keep track of. Many have been nice, but I have rarely been completely blown away by them. Until now.
reviews.title: The Best Accommodation I've ever been to

reviews.text: As a regular travel, and travel writer, I have been to a lot of high end hotels and apartments. The Beach Suites are officially my favourite accommodations that I have ever stayed at. I literally wish that I could live here, because I really don't want to leave.
reviews.title: Beach Suites will take your breath away!

reviews.text: Upon walking in, I couldn't believe how large the main room was and how clean the design was. The floor to ceiling windows fully slide back to create an open air feeling and more space.
reviews.title: Fabulous!

reviews.text: The patios wrap around the doors, and there are even more patios by the bedrooms. The bathrooms are incredibly luxurious, and numerous. The entire apartment scream luxury.
reviews.title: extremely expensive

reviews.text: Stayed here for my wedding in Byron in October.
reviews.title: Five star service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was flawless - nothing was too much trouble and they made us feel so special.
reviews.title: Expensive view of the water

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a garden suite as they were really big and therefore had plenty of space for my bridesmaids and I to get ready in the morning.
reviews.title: 'So Much Style, So Relaxing'

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would absolutely recommend Beach Suites to anyone and we will definitely be back there soon.
reviews.title: Great stay at Beach Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I did get a fabulous location and view from the deck, but it is a hotel room. Yes a bed in a room, with a nice bathroom. The decor needs an update so does the uncomfortable bed and paver like pillows. Ive never reviewed before, always reading others. Its time for accomodations in this country to give what is paid for otherwise consumers will continue to take their money overseas. Venturing overseas every second year, I want to pay $420 a night, but get what I pay for in this country.
reviews.title: Heaven in paradise

reviews.text: We booked a Garden Suite for a weeks break in late January after lots of searching online and we were delighted with Beach Suites as it really is the perfect spot to explore Byron. It is right in the thick of things but perfectly private and quiet too. It has the beach right in front and to the right is a lovely wooded walk to Clarkes Beach which has a superb cafe with super beach views.We went there nearly every morning.
reviews.title: THE BEST PLACE TO STAY IN BYRON

reviews.text: Our suite was room seven - conveniently close to the rear exit to the main route to the beach and we think a tad bigger than other Garden Suites. For us, a family of two teenage boys aged 13 and 16 and a 12 month toddler it was perfect. We had a large family bathroom with walk-in shower and spa bath , a separate room for us - while the boys had a large bed in the main lounge. The Kitchen is well appointed with a good quality CLEAN BBQ although no cook top (but who is going to cook on holiday anyway). We thought having the second bedroom as part of the lounge was going to be inconvenient but it wasn't at all - our bedroom was a nice place to be and had a second flatscreen although we never really used it. Reception were really friendly and the amount of repeat business they seem to have must be a good sign. The carpark underneath was also really convenient and secure.
reviews.title: Rockstar accomodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My advice is unless you really need a lap pool - save some money and get a Garden Suite rather than one of the beach ones! you have the most beautiful beach right out front anyway
reviews.title: We like top class accommodation - this is it.

reviews.text: We stayed at Beach Suites for 3 nights in late January. We booked a beach studio but on arrival we were upgraded to the penthouse suite. We have stayed at many many 5 star hotels and apartments and this was by far the best room (and hotel) we have ever stayed in. When i say room - the suite was nearly bigger than my house. And the rooftop with its fantastic pool and view just made us feel like celebrities. Above all it's the very rare feeling that the staff want you to have the absolute best experience there - nothing is too much trouble and there is just an overall feeling of generousity (which i have never found in a hotel before) I have told every person I meet since about the Beach Suites and I would highly recommend it to anyone. The accomodation really made our stay in Byron.
reviews.title: Amazing Wedding Gift - Penthouse Luxury

reviews.text: Stayed for three nights and were kindly upgraded to 2 bedroom penthouse suite. Wow!!
reviews.title: Great Location, service, cleanliness, and large room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed at Beach Suites Apartments for 4 nights. Located at the main beach with easy access to good restaurants and shops within 5 mins walk. The rooms are SPACIOUS
reviews.title: Spoil yourself at Byron

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: and very well appionted. Staff are very helpful. Secure underground parking.
reviews.title: Splendid Splendour Vacay

reviews.text: Priced at the high end but worth a stay. There was a plunge pool infront and ocean views
reviews.title: Location superb - quality outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: from the deck
reviews.title: Lovely accommodation in perfect location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Superb location and overall a great Byron Bay choice. We were charged a ridiculous amount because of the Splendour festival and it certainly is not worth the $490 a night rate they charged. But a nice place none-the less. At times house keeping were a bit lazy - no replacement soap and shampoo one day for example. Also they do not provide all of the things you would expect at this price like a body moisturiser in the bathroom for example. But this small oversights did not matter in the scheme of things as our place had lots of other small touches like complimentary fresh milk, great BBQ and location location location. And the rooms were lovely and quiet and beautiful fresh air through the whole place.
reviews.title: We came back a second time...

description: Byron Bay's most private beachfront luxury accommodation. The best of Byron with light filled and spacious rooms, quality furniture and fittings. Two and three bedroom penthouse apartments with their own rooftop pool, Studio style rooms in a garden setting or Beachfront studios with their own private plunge pool and private front gates for direct beach access. A beautiful boutique hotel in the heart of Byron Bay.
